item.title: Live Updates: Senate Advances Measure to Curb Trump’s Use of Force in Venezuela
item.description: In a rebuke to the president, the Senate narrowly agreed to bring up a War Powers Act resolution for a vote next week. The measure would require Mr. T...

item.title: Venezuela Leaders to Free Political Prisoners in a Sign of Possible Change

item.title: Trump Addresses Venezuela, Greenland and Presidential Power in New York Times Interview
item.description: On topic after topic, President Trump made clear that he would be the arbiter of any limits to his authorities, not international law or treaties.
